item.description:
Come and join us for coffee, hot chocolate or tea and show off a sample of your creative work, a great way to get feedback from other artists regardless of medium.

Let's meet outside the Cafe, and decide on where to meet, if it's slow then we can meet there, if not and it's a nice day - let's sit outside someplace and meet - coffee in had of course - I'll update again if need be as the weather is often so unpredictable.

Past "Show and Tell" events have had quilters, digital artists, photographers, painters, sculptors come and show their work or photos of their work. Every event has been a great success and fun for all.

Hope to meet you there!

Paul
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a sign, if it's nice outside we will meet in the park
item.name: Creative Show and Tell
